overview: Carroll Baker stars in this psychedelic shocker about a mysterious witch who casts a spell over attractive, youthful fashion photographer Valentina Rosselli (Isabelle De Funes). Thrust into a world of sadism, Valentina must figure out whether the torture being inflicted on her is because of one woman's twisted agenda â€¦ or a curse known as Baba Yaga.
tagline: Is it real or is it a dream.
title: Baba Yaga
